verses.text: \w Oh|strong="H4310"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* head \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spring \w of|strong="H4057"\w* water, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* eyes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H4057"\w* tears! \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* weep day \w and|strong="H3212"\w* night \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* slain daughter \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* traveler’s lodge \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* wilderness, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* abandon \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* adulterers, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crowd \w of|strong="H3068"\w* faithless \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

“\w They|strong="H3588"\w* bend \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongues \w like|strong="H1980"\w* bows; lies prevail \w over|strong="H5921"\w* truth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w proceed|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w to|strong="H1980"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w*,” declares the LORD.

“\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* everyone guard \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*; \w do|strong="H8267"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* trust \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w*, \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H2048"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w* deals craftily, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H2048"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* spreads slander.

Each \w one|strong="H3068"\w* betrays \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w friend|strong="H3045"\w*; \w no|strong="H3045"\w* \w one|strong="H3068"\w* \w tells|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* truth. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongues \w to|strong="H3068"\w* lie; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* wear \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* committing iniquity.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* dwell \f + \fr 9:6 \ft That is, Jeremiah dwells (the Hebrew is singular)\f* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* deception; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* deceit \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* know \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*,” declares the LORD.

Therefore \w this|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* Hosts \w says|strong="H1696"\w*: “Behold, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* refine \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* test \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w for|strong="H7130"\w* \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w else|strong="H7453"\w* can \w I|strong="H7760"\w* do because \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \f + \fr 9:7 \ft LXX because of the wickedness of\f* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w My|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* tongues \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w deadly|strong="H5315"\w* arrows; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* speak deception. \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w speaks|strong="H5002"\w* peace \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbor, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* sets \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Should|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* punish \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*? declares \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Should|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* avenge \w Myself|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nation \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w*?”

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* weeping \w and|strong="H3063"\w* wailing \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mountains, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dirge \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness pasture, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* been scorched \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w one|strong="H1097"\w* passes \w through|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* lowing \w of|strong="H3427"\w* cattle \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* heard. Both \w the|strong="H5414"\w* birds \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* air \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* beasts \w have|strong="H3063"\w* fled; \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* gone \w away|strong="H5414"\w*.

“\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* Jerusalem \w a|strong="H3068"\w* heap \w of|strong="H3068"\w* rubble, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* haunt \w for|strong="H5921"\w* jackals;\f + \fr 9:11 \ft Or serpents or dragons\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desolation, \w without|strong="H1097"\w* inhabitant.”

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* wise enough \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w*? \w To|strong="H1980"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H8085"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* explain \w it|strong="H5414"\w*? \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* destroyed \w and|strong="H1980"\w* scorched \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desert, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H1980"\w* pass \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3212"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answered, “\w It|strong="H3212"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* because \w they|strong="H3820"\w* have forsaken \w My|strong="H3925"\w* law, which \w I|strong="H3212"\w* set before \w them|strong="H3925"\w*; \w they|strong="H3820"\w* have \w not|strong="H3212"\w* \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w it|strong="H3212"\w* or obeyed \w My|strong="H3925"\w* voice.

Instead, \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* followed \w the|strong="H3541"\w* stubbornness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w gone|strong="H3068"\w* after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* Baals, \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers taught \w them|strong="H8248"\w*.”

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w this|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H2719"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* Hosts, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* Israel, says: “\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w feed|strong="H3615"\w* \w this|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* wormwood \w and|strong="H7971"\w* give \w them|strong="H1992"\w* poisoned water \w to|strong="H5704"\w* drink.

\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* scatter \w them|strong="H7971"\w* among \w the|strong="H3541"\w* nations \w that|strong="H3068"\w* neither \w they|strong="H3068"\w* nor \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* known, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w after|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w until|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* finished \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w off|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H5375"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Hosts says: “\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* note, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* summon \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* women; send \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* most skillful \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H7993"\w* come \w quickly|strong="H3966"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* take \w up|strong="H4908"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lament over \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* eyes \w may|strong="H8085"\w* overflow \w with|strong="H6726"\w* tears, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* eyelids \w may|strong="H8085"\w* gush \w with|strong="H6726"\w* water.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sound|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* Zion: ‘\w How|strong="H3588"\w* devastated \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w*! \w How|strong="H3588"\w* great \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* shame! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* abandoned \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* dwellings \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* torn \w down|strong="H3588"\w*.’”

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* women, hear \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Open|strong="H7339"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* ears \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w His|strong="H3588"\w* mouth. Teach \w your|strong="H3588"\w* daughters \w to|strong="H5927"\w* wail, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* another \w to|strong="H5927"\w* lament.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5038"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* climbed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* windows; \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fortresses \w to|strong="H1696"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* streets, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* young men \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* town squares.

Declare \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w The|strong="H3541"\w* corpses \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* fall \w like|strong="H3541"\w* dung \w upon|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* open field, \w like|strong="H3541"\w* newly cut grain behind \w the|strong="H3541"\w* reaper, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* no \w one|strong="H1368"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* gather \w it|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*: “Let \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* strong \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* strength, \w nor|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* wealthy \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* riches.

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w let|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* boasts boast \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* understands \w and|strong="H3068"\w* knows \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 9:24 \ft Cited in 1 Corinthians 1:31 and 2 Corinthians 10:17\f* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* exercises loving devotion,\f + \fr 9:24 \ft Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* justice \w and|strong="H3068"\w* righteousness \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth— \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*,” declares the LORD.

“Behold, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w are|strong="H1121"\w* coming,” declares \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* punish \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* circumcised \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*:

Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammon, Moab, and all the inhabitants of the desert who clip the hair of their temples. For all these nations are uncircumcised, and the whole house of Israel is uncircumcised in heart.”
